Welcome to the Internet History of Turkey

This website explores how the internet evolved in Turkey, from its early days to modern broadband and mobile technology.

The internet has become an essential part of modern life, transforming communication, education, business, and entertainment. But how did it all begin in Turkey? This website explores the history of the internet in Turkey, from its first connection in 1993 to today’s high-speed broadband and 5G networks. Discover how the internet has evolved, the milestones that shaped its growth, and how Turkey became a digitally connected nation.
